headline: Comcast Business Unveils Powerful New Suite of Solutions and Upgrades for Millions of American Small Businesses
summary: PHILADELPHIA, November 24, 2025--Comcast Business, the largest provider of connectivity to small businesses in America, today announced a powerful new suite of advanced solutions and upgrades designed to help keep small businesses connected, protected, and prepared ahead of the holiday rush – and beyond.

headline: Bernstein Reiterates a Hold Rating on Comcast Corporation (CMCSA)
summary: ​Comcast Corporation (NASDAQ:CMCSA) is one of the Best Communication and Media Stocks to Buy Now. On November 19, Laurent Yoon from Bernstein reiterated a Hold rating on the stock with a $34 price target. However, earlier on November 13, Craig Moffet from Moffetnathonson had maintained a Buy rating on Comcast Corporation (NASDAQ:CMCSA), but lowered the […]

headline: A Market Rebound Can Last. Why Ukraine, Fed Rate Hopes Are Eclipsing AI Fears and 5 More Things to Know Today.
summary: Interest rates should be higher based on the Taylor rule, Thanksgiving air travel will be busiest in 15 years, and more news to start your day.

headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid CMCSA and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Comcast has gotten torched over the last six months - since May 2025, its stock price has dropped 21.7% to $27.37 per share. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.

raw.headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid CMCSA and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
raw.summary: Comcast has gotten torched over the last six months - since May 2025, its stock price has dropped 21.7% to $27.37 per share. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.

headline: Trump Says TV Networks Shouldn’t Be Able to ‘Enlarge’
summary: Trump’s post was in response to a Newsmax story that said Federal Communications Commission head Brendan Carr is moving to give television networks massive reach and push through a merger of Nexstar Media Group and Tegna Inc.  The FCC didn’t respond to a request for comment on Sunday evening.
